name: Joaquin
description: We find ourselves in the land of Ovonia where Joaquin, the current monarch of the country, discovers that his eggs have been stolen by Komaji, the evil chief of the wolf clan. Faced with such a situation, Joaquin decides to undertake a journey throughout the land of Ovonia with the sole aim of recovering what was taken from him, Crossing numerous biomes, jumping from platform to platform and defeating every enemy or vile servant of Komaji on his way to his eggs.
